content.description: Magazine advertisement from 1924Courtesy of Duke University Libraries Digital Collections
content.question: The advertisement best reflects which of the following economic transformations during the period?

choices.label: An emphasis on families as the primary drivers of the economy
The federal efforts to regulate the trade practices of large corporations
The shift from an industrial economy to a service-based one
An increase in the production and sale of consumer goods

content.answer: An increase in the production and sale of consumer goods

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
